title: Anti-Wrinkle Injections
description: FDA-approved muscle relaxing injections that smooth dynamic wrinkles and prevent new lines from forming
longDescription: Anti-wrinkle injections are the world's most popular non-surgical cosmetic treatment. Using purified botulinum toxin type A, this treatment temporarily relaxes specific facial muscles responsible for expression lines, resulting in smoother, more youthful-looking skin while maintaining natural facial expressions.

seo.h1: Anti-Wrinkle Injections in London | Natural, Expert Results

hero.headline: Smooth Away Years, Keep Your Expression
hero.subheadline: Expert anti-wrinkle treatments for naturally refreshed, youthful skin

overview.title: What Are Anti-Wrinkle Injections?
overview.content:
Anti-wrinkle injections use a purified protein (botulinum toxin type A) to temporarily relax specific facial muscles. When these muscles relax, the overlying skin becomes smooth, reducing the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This treatment is particularly effective for expression lines—wrinkles that form when you smile, frown, or squint.

At Dr. SNA Clinic, we use premium, FDA-approved products and advanced injection techniques to ensure natural-looking results that enhance your appearance without compromising facial expression.
highlights: Natural results that maintain facial expression

treatsAreas.subtitle: We can address wrinkles and lines across the upper and mid-face

areas.name: Forehead Lines
areas.description: Horizontal lines across the forehead caused by raising eyebrows

areas.name: Frown Lines (11's)
areas.description: Vertical lines between eyebrows that create an angry or tired appearance

areas.name: Crow's Feet
areas.description: Fine lines radiating from the outer corners of eyes when smiling

areas.name: Bunny Lines
areas.description: Wrinkles on the sides of the nose when scrunching

areas.name: Lip Flip
areas.description: Subtle eversion of upper lip for a fuller appearance without filler

areas.name: Gummy Smile
areas.description: Reduce excessive gum display when smiling

areas.name: Chin Dimpling
areas.description: Smooth pebbled appearance of the chin

process.title: What to Expect: Your Treatment Journey
process.subtitle: From consultation to beautiful results

steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: We discuss your concerns, assess your facial anatomy, and create a personalized treatment plan. We'll explain exactly what to expect and answer all your questions.
tips: Bring photos of how you looked younger

steps.title: Preparation
steps.description: Your face will be cleansed and we'll mark the precise injection points based on your facial anatomy and muscle movements.

steps.title: Treatment
steps.description: Precise injections are administered into the target muscles using ultra-fine needles. Most clients describe it as a minor pinch with minimal discomfort.

steps.title: Post-Treatment
steps.description: You can leave immediately and resume normal activities. We'll provide detailed aftercare instructions to optimize results.

steps.title: Results & Follow-Up
steps.description: Results appear gradually over 3-14 days. We offer a complimentary 2-week review to assess results and make any adjustments.

beforeAfter.title: Real Results from Real Patients
beforeAfter.subtitle: See the natural, rejuvenating effects of expert anti-wrinkle treatment
beforeAfter.disclaimer: Individual results may vary. Photos shared with patient consent.

faq.question: Does it hurt?
faq.answer: Most clients describe the sensation as a minor pinch or mosquito bite. We use ultra-fine needles and advanced techniques to minimize discomfort. The entire treatment takes just 10-15 minutes, making any discomfort very brief. No anesthetic is typically required.

faq.question: Will I look frozen or unnatural?
faq.answer: Absolutely not when performed correctly. Our expert injectors use precise dosing and strategic placement to soften wrinkles while maintaining natural facial expressions. You'll look refreshed and relaxed, not frozen. The goal is to enhance your natural beauty, not change it.

faq.question: How long until I see results?
faq.answer: Results appear gradually over 3-14 days, with full effects visible by 2 weeks. Some people notice initial softening within 3-4 days, while others take the full 2 weeks. We offer a complimentary review at 2 weeks to assess results and make any adjustments.

faq.question: How long do results last?
faq.answer: Results typically last 3-6 months, depending on factors like metabolism, muscle strength, and the area treated. Forehead and crow's feet tend to last 4-5 months, while stronger muscles (like frown lines) may require more frequent treatment. With regular maintenance, results can last longer over time.

faq.question: Are there any side effects?
faq.answer: Common side effects are minor and temporary: slight redness, mild swelling, or small bruises at injection sites, usually resolving within hours to a few days. Headache occurs in 1-2% of patients. Serious side effects are rare when performed by qualified practitioners. We'll discuss all risks during consultation.

faq.question: What should I avoid after treatment?
faq.answer: For 24 hours: avoid lying down for 4 hours, intense exercise, alcohol, facials, massages, or rubbing treated areas. Avoid blood-thinning supplements (like fish oil, vitamin E) for a week before treatment to minimize bruising. We provide detailed aftercare instructions.

faq.question: When is the best age to start?
faq.answer: There's no single 'right' age. Many people start preventatively in their late 20s to early 30s when fine lines first appear. Others begin later when wrinkles are more established. The best time is when you notice lines that bother you. We treat patients from their mid-20s to 70s+.

faq.question: Can men have this treatment?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Anti-wrinkle injections are increasingly popular with men ('Brotox'). Men often require slightly higher doses due to stronger facial muscles. We tailor treatments to maintain masculine features while reducing lines.

faq.question: How much does it cost?
faq.answer: Pricing depends on the areas treated and amount of product required. Single area treatments start from £195, with package deals available for multiple areas. We'll provide an exact quote during your consultation. Many clients treat 2-3 areas in one session.

faq.question: Is it safe during pregnancy or breastfeeding?
faq.answer: As a precaution, we do not treat pregnant or breastfeeding women. While no harm has been reported, there isn't sufficient research in these populations. We recommend waiting until after you've finished breastfeeding.

faq.question: What's the difference between brands (Botox, Dysport, etc.)?
faq.answer: All FDA-approved brands (Botox, Dysport, Azzalure, Bocouture) contain the same active ingredient and work similarly. Small differences exist in spread and duration. At Dr. SNA Clinic, we use premium brands and will discuss which is best for your specific needs.

faq.question: Can I combine this with other treatments?
faq.answer: Yes! Anti-wrinkle injections work beautifully with dermal fillers (to address both dynamic and static wrinkles), skin boosters, and laser treatments. Many clients combine treatments for comprehensive facial rejuvenation. We'll create a personalized combination plan.

testimonials.name: Emma R.
testimonials.text: Dr. Abbas is an absolute artist! I was nervous about looking frozen, but the results are incredibly natural. I just look like a well-rested, slightly younger version of myself. My husband didn't even notice I'd had anything done—he just said I looked radiant!

testimonials.name: James M.
testimonials.text: I was skeptical about 'Brotox' but I'm so glad I tried it. People kept asking if I was angry or tired when I wasn't. Now my face matches how I actually feel. The treatment was quick, painless, and completely discreet. None of my colleagues noticed!

testimonials.name: Sarah L.
testimonials.text: I've been getting anti-wrinkle injections at Dr. SNA Clinic for 3 years now. The consistency is incredible—I know exactly what to expect every time. Dr. Abbas really understands facial anatomy and always achieves beautiful, natural results.
